A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A despicable film that disregards\, disdains\, or actively destroys everything that preceded it\, including The Force Awakens. 

Rian Johnson's Episode 8 is a smug\, politicized vanity project that treats TFA as a nuisance and trolls its own audience. How a script this destructive and logically absurd was greenlighted I'll never understand. 

Johnson mischaracterizes and destroys well-established legacy characters and ignores numerous rich story veins\, yet builds nothing in return. 

The Last Jedi manages to squander every bit of good will\, excitement\, and narrative possibility generated by TFA -- killing investment in the current anthology and tainting and undermining both the OT and TFA. 

The one star is for the visuals and some of the acting. 

I wish I could undo having seen this film. It has permanently damaged my relationship with Star Wars.
